Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this opportunity, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $75. This exclusive offer is available only for a limited time, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information about the product, please let me know. I look forward to hearing from you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
